donation_message:
This bot is an open-source project lovingly maintained in my free time. There are no premium features or hidden fees, just a lot of hard work. If you appreciate the effort and want to support development, you can do so with a donation.

[Make your contribution here](https://coff.ee/mralexsaavedra)

menu_main:
*ğŸ™ï¸ SpotDL Bot*
Download songs, albums, artists, or playlists directly from Spotify.

ğŸ“Œ *Available commands:*

â€¢ /authorize â€“ Authorize the bot to access your Spotify account. Required to download your liked songs or sync your playlists.
â€¢ /download â€“ Download a song, album, artist, or playlist using a Spotify URL.
â€¢ /downloadsavedsongs â€“ Download all your liked songs in your library.
â€¢ /downloadsavedalbums â€“ Download all albums saved in your library.
â€¢ /downloadsavedplaylists â€“ Download all playlists saved in your library.
â€¢ /downloaduserplaylists â€“ Download all playlists you have created.
â€¢ /sync â€“ Sync your Spotify library and remove songs that are no longer in your playlists or albums.
â€¢ /version â€“ Show the current bot version.
â€¢ /donate â€“ Support development with a donation.

â„¹ï¸ *Tip:* You can also send a Spotify URL directly to download it automatically.

ğŸ’¡ *Need help?* Use /start anytime to return to this menu.
menu_option_donate: Support the project with a donation

menu_option_download_saved_playlists: Download all your saved playlists from Spotify
menu_option_download_url: Download a song, album, or playlist from a URL
